topic.title: EMS Vital Signs Section - conformance rules

section.p: Collection of vital signs and other observations about the patient's status

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11399 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.23"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8716-3" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10252)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Vital Signs" which SHOULD equal "EMS Vital Signs" (CONF:10254)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:10970)
Conforms to Vital Signs Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.28)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8716-3" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10252)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Vital Signs" which SHOULD equal "EMS Vital Signs" (CONF:10254)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:10970)
Conforms to Vital Signs Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.28)

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.23"/> <code code="8716-3" displayName="Vital Signs"/> <title>EMS Vital Signs</title> <text/> </section>
